events.name: The Whisperwood
events.description: You enter a part of the Falroh known as the Whisperwood. The air here is strangely still, yet filled with a constant, rustling murmur that isn't caused by wind. The ancient, silver-barked trees seem to lean in, their leaves brushing against each other in a sibilant chorus. Faint, ethereal lights drift between the trunks like fireflies. The elves consider this a sacred, communicative place; for outsiders, the endless, unintelligible whispering can be deeply unsettling.

possibilities.description: The murmuring is unnerving. Return to familiar paths.
